Description.Text: Soyuz is a friendly 3-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation in north Moscow. Highlights include onsite dining, free parking, saunas and a peaceful location within the Khimkinskiy lesopark. Khimkinskiy lesopark is a pleasant forested area located either side of the MKAD ring road in north Moscow. Nearby places of interest include the majestic Moskva River and the water transport hub North River Terminal. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Moscow destinations. The hotel occupies a mid-rise property featuring a light-coloured, panelled faÃ§ade. Facilities include two saunas, a massage treatment room and a billiards table. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are unpretentiously decorated in warm colours with patterned fabrics and classic furniture design. Amenities include satellite TV, a mini-bar and an en-suite bathroom. The hotel restaurant serves an impressive array of delicious international dishes in an inviting, friendly space that also boasts an extensive drinks menu, and a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
